comments:
Windows 2000 Professional, JDK 1.4.2_08
----------------------------------------
After using Update Manager to upgrade from 3.1.0 to 3.1.1 (as described on
http://www.eclipse.org/eclipse/platform-releng/updatesfor3.1.1.html), I am
unable to start Eclipse. => "An error has occured. See the log file".
I have included the .log file entry.

Many thanks in advance!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Michael,
Did upgrade from finish successfully and were you asked to restart eclipse after
that? If upgrade was not successful at which point did it fail and what was the
error?

Hi Branko!
Yes, the update did finish successfully and I were asked to restart eclipse.
At this point I said no. But only in order to close my currently opened project.
Afterwards I finished Eclipse instantly and started it again...
*** Bug 112064 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Is there any solution available for it...?

Michael,
I can't reproduce this and i have to assume many other people did not have problems with this upgrade. So, i am downgrading severity.
